en_text: Damn!
jp_text: {\blur2}くそ　なんだよ　さっきの狼は

en_text: it's probably...
jp_text: {\blur2}おそらく…

en_text: You know something?
jp_text: {\blur2}何か知ってんのかよ

en_text: The remaining survivors of the Founders.
jp_text: {\blur2}始祖の生き残りだ

en_text: The Founders?
jp_text: {\blur2}始祖？

en_text: Another target, huh? Could that possibly be...
jp_text: {\blur2}それってもしかして…

en_text: Pancake?
jp_text: {\blur2}チチナシか

en_text: Most likely. She was the only one \Nnot here during the attack.
jp_text: {\blur2}ここにいなかったのは彼女だけですから
google_translated: Because it was not a girl who was not here

en_text: Presumably, they're after her blood.
jp_text: {\blur2}おそらく彼女の血でしょ

en_text: I'm certain they're looking \Nfor her right this minute.
jp_text: {\blur2}今も　彼女の行方を探しているに違いありません
google_translated: Now you must be looking for her

en_text: The Founders exert maximum strength \Nduring the lunar eclipse.
jp_text: {\blur2}始祖は月蝕の時　最大の力を発揮する
google_translated: The foundor demonstrates the largest power of the month

en_text: It's reckless to face them.
jp_text: {\blur2}戦うのは無茶だ
google_translated: It's a stupid thing to fight

en_text: Ruki-kun, are you feeling better?
jp_text: {\blur2}んなこと知るか

en_text: Yeah.
jp_text: {\blur2}ああ

en_text: Good. I'm glad.
jp_text: {\blur2}ユイを渡してたまるか

en_text: Ayato-kun? How did you get those cuts?
jp_text: {\blur2}チチナシ　お前もつくづく悪運が強えな
google_translated: Chichinashi You can also get bad luck

en_text: Me?
jp_text: {\blur2}私？

en_text: It seems they're after your blood.
jp_text: {\blur2}そいつら　お前の血を狙ってるらしい
google_translated: It seems that you are aiming for your blood

en_text: But why?
jp_text: {\blur2}けど　どうして

en_text: If they are after your blood, \Nthey'll be here soon.
jp_text: {\blur2}その狙いがお前の血なら　直にここへ来るだろう
google_translated: The aim will come here directly if you are your blood

en_text: Once the time comes to \Nreach their full strength.
jp_text: {\blur2}力が完全に満ちる時を迎えたらな
google_translated: When the power is full of fully filled

en_text: I don't want to cause any more \Ntrouble than I already have.
jp_text: {\blur2}これ以上　皆に迷惑かけられない
google_translated: I can not bother everyone more than this

en_text: I don't want all of you to get involved.
jp_text: {\blur2}今お前を一人にしたら　始祖の連中に連れ去られるだけだ
google_translated: If you make one of you now, you just can get along

en_text: Don't be stupid! What \Ncan you do by yourself?!
jp_text: {\blur2}んざけんな　お前一人で何ができるんだよ
google_translated: Men What can you do with one person alone

en_text: But...
jp_text: {\blur2}でも…

en_text: What?
jp_text: {\blur2}何だ

en_text: Vampire powers decrease \Nduring the lunar eclipse.
jp_text: {\blur2}月蝕中はヴァンパイアの力が落ちる
google_translated: Vampire power falls during the moon erosion

en_text: You purebloods will especially be affected.
jp_text: {\blur2}純血のお前たちは　特に影響を受けるだろ

en_text: We need to work together.
jp_text: {\blur2}仕方ねえ

en_text: To protect Eve from the Founders.
jp_text: {\blur2}イブを始祖から守るために
google_translated: To protect  Eve from the founder

en_text: Is that all right with you?
jp_text: {\blur2}それでいいか

en_text: I'm asking if you agree.
jp_text: {\blur2}でもな　これだけは言っておく

en_text: Yes.
jp_text: {\blur2}はい

en_text: You're my one and only Eve.
jp_text: {\blur2}お前は俺だけのイブだ

en_text: Feel only my fangs on your skin.
jp_text: {\blur2}俺の牙だけを感じろ

en_text: Freedom taken away, imprisoned... \NPerpetually suffering...
jp_text: {\blur2}自由を奪われ　囚われ　苦しみ続ける
google_translated: Liberty is robbed and caught and suffering

en_text: But that won't work.
jp_text: {\blur2}だが　それではダメなんだ

en_text: I believe we can become Adam only
jp_text: {\blur2}俺たちは　アダムになれるんじゃないかと思う
google_translated: We think that we can become Adam

en_text: when Eve has free will and free choice.
jp_text: {\blur2}イブの自由な意志と選択があってこそ
google_translated: If there is a free will and choice of Eve

en_text: I wanted to know what you'd want to do.
jp_text: {\blur2}お前の意思を確認しておきたかった
google_translated: I wanted to confirm your intention

en_text: So I can be chosen as Adam by Eve.
jp_text: {\blur2}アダムとして　イブに選ばれるためにも
google_translated: Even to be selected as Eve as Adam

en_text: I'm not gonna give up either, masochistic kitten.
jp_text: {\blur2}おれだって諦めないよ　エム猫ちゃん

en_text: You're our...
jp_text: {\blur2}君は　俺たちの

en_text: Pre-ordained destiny... To the future beyond.
jp_text: {\blur2}その先にある未来へ
